data.name: Salamangreat Transcendence
data.desc: Target 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster with the same name from your Extra Deck, using that monster you control as the entire material. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) You can only activate 1 "Salamangreat Transcendence" per turn.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
